thread.title_full: Exceptionally friendly staff - Review of Hotel HELUSSI, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KT N
title: Exceptionally friendly staff
text:
From the moment I checked in, the staff made me feel incredibly welcome. I received an upgraded room with a balcony for free just because it was available, and was always greeted with a smile whenever I passed the front desk.
Bedrooms and bathrooms are clean and modern, and there is a free private sauna on site for use after a long day of sightseeing or shopping.
It is an easy 10 minute walk to Gare du Nord, and there are plenty of bars, restaurants and convenience stores within walking distance.
I really can't say enough about how friendly the staff are. I'll certainly be staying here again on my next trip to Paris.
